paper_abstract: A time saving algorithm for the Monte Carlo method of Metropolis is presented. The technique is tested with different potential models and number of particles. The coupling of the method with neighbor lists, linked lists, Ewald sum and reaction field techniques is also analyzed. It is shown that the proposed algorithm is particularly suitable for computationally heavy intermolecular potentials. (C) 2006 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: A time saving algorithm for the Monte Carlo method of Metropolis
